results.brief_description: Shows how people of an alpine village depend upon the making of Emmentaler cheese for their income.

results.title: Dad's house, mum's house
results.brief_description: Shared custody, co-parenting, share-parenting…it goes by different names. The children may move back and forth between parents, or one parent may retain day-to-day care…its form varies from family to family. Joint custody allows both parents to participate in major decisions affecting their child’s health, education and welfare.
results.description: Shared custody, co-parenting, share-parenting…it goes by different names. results.title: Cyclic track maintenance
results.creator_credit: Ted Davis, Harry Hauptmann and Victorian Railways Board
results.brief_description: This film displays the regular maintenance by Victorian Railways’ track engineers to keep tracks up to standard. Interesting sequences of the special machines and equipment in use, testing and re-laying train tracks.

results.title: Cutting the queue
results.creator_credit: British Information Services and Richard Costain Film Unit
results.brief_description: Gives a comprehensive survey of the work of British civil engineers involved in the construction of the Apapa Wharf extension at Lagos, which was needed to cope with the rapid expansion of Nigeria’s import and export trade.

results.title: Customer service
results.brief_description: The aim of this program is to present knowledge and techniques required to develop and maintain on-going service to customers and to convert complaints into appointments to further strengthen customer ties. A manual which complements this program may be borrowed as a separate loan item.

results.title: Currajong: a different way (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Steve Thomas and Steve Thomas Video Productions
results.brief_description: A look at Currajong Primary School, an establishment catering for “intelligent underachievers”. Describes its unique approach to working with kids who have failed in all kinds of schools.

results.title: Curious George rides a bike
results.brief_description: Based on the story by H.A. Rey with his illustrations, this animated film tells of the droll adventures, pranks and triumphs of a monkey called George when he is given a push bike for a present.
